title: Carly Rae Jepsen Just Announced Two Aussie Gigs ‘Cos She Really, Really, Really Likes You
text:
Thanks for signing up!

Good morning, starry-eyed teens and wizened punks venturing into 80s nostalgia, and welcome to a world where Carly Rae Jepsen has announced standalone Australian gigs.

Jepsen, she of Call Me Maybe and E•MO•TION fame, today announced a pair of sideshows to accompany her appearance at SandTunes Music Festival.

The pop gun will grace stages Sydney’s Enmore Theatre on Tuesday, November 26, before hiking off to Melbourne’s Forum Theatre on Monday, December 2.

She’ll be bringing the hits from her aforementioned record, along with fresher bops from 2019’s Dedicated.

Of course, all of this is in addition to that SandTunes date, which will see Jepsen on a bill including Travis Scott, Logic, and CHVRCHES, among other killers.

If that’s your bag, feel free to grab a sword ticketing deets here.
description: The beloved pop gun is touching down in November.
